member.name: P:ServiceStack.JsonHttpClient.Headers
member.summary: Gets the collection of headers to be added to outgoing requests.

member.name: P:ServiceStack.JsonHttpClient.BasePath
member.summary: Relative BasePath to use for predefined routes. Set with `UseBasePath` or `WithBasePath()` Always contains '/' prefix + '/' suffix, e.g. /api/

member.name: P:ServiceStack.JsonHttpClient.UseBasePath
member.summary: Replace the Base reply/oneway paths to use a different prefix
